amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 141 of the bill which provides for the establishment of a Commission on Native American Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 141 of the bill. Section 141 provides for the establishment of a Commission on Native American Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 151 (Roll no. 312).
